meanings.definition: Varying from something else in form, quality, amount, or nature.
meanings.sent1: The two flowers had differing colors.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the differing sizes of the cupcakes.
meanings.sent4: The differing paths they took in life led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The differing shapes of the clouds made the sky look like a painting.
